wikipedia_page.main: Willie McFarlane (1 October 1923 in Fallin – October 1998) was a Scottish footballer, who played for Bathgate Thistle, Hearts, Stirling Albion, Kilmarnock and Inverness Caledonian. McFarlane represented Scotland once, in a 6–0 victory against Luxembourg in May 1947.

response: *Willie McFarlane (athlete), winner of the New Year Sprint in 1933 and 1934
*Willie McFarlane (1923–1998), Scottish football player (Heart of Midlothian)
